resources.string:
Installs the latest build of Chromium. 
Chromium builds don't auto-update. 
To update just install Chromium again. 
 
NOTE: Latest builds may be buggy. 
 
APK courtesy of the Chromium team 
 
 How to Safely Install Chromium: 
 1. Allow Unknown sources. 
 2. Install Chromium 
 3. Turn off Unknown sources 
 
It is unsafe to leave your device with 'Unknown sources' enabled. 
To minimize your attack surface follow these simple steps. 
GetChromium is designed to install Chromium the in the safest possible way. 
Leaving your Settings with 'Unknown sources' enabled means your device is in a vulnerable state 24/7. 
The only safe way to install or update Chromium without Google's help is manually. 
The Chromium team releases Chromium APK constantly. 
To keep your Chromium browser up to date simply install Chromium again. 
All of your bookmarks and settings will be exactly as they were in the previous version.
